citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There was more than a day's amount of waste in the outdoor runs of the enclosures. Daily spot cleaning is required of
primary enclosures to prevent build-up of waste and disease hazards. Ensure that each area of a dog's primary
enclosure is spot-cleaned daily as required to prevent a build-up of waste.
Correct by 1/7/2022.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
There was more than a day's amount of waste in the outdoor runs of the enclosures.  Daily spot cleaning is required of 
primary enclosures to prevent build-up of waste and disease hazards.  Ensure that each area of a dog's primary 
enclosure is spot-cleaned daily as required to prevent a build-up of waste. 
 
Correct by 1/7/2022. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
